system.description: When a faction openly attacks another faction, roll with the difference between the two factions' Sizes.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, the target instead springs a clever trap; they capture or destroy an asset or reduce the attacker's Size, their choice.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value: On a hit, the targeted faction sacrifices an appropriate asset or loses a point of Size, their choice. On a 7-9, the attacking faction must sacrifice an appropriate asset or lose a point of Size as well.

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value: On a hit, the targeted faction sacrifices an appropriate asset or loses a point of Size, their choice.
